default_connector: This can be any of the <connectors> keys. Ex: trello

slack.token: The Slack token that you generated
slack.client_id: [CLI] The client id. It's used only if you need to generate a token from our tools. You should create a Slack App and use your client id.
slack.secret: [CLI] The slack secret if you need to generate a OAuth token from our tools. You should create a Slack App and use your app secret.

g_drive.file_id: [CLI]The Google Drive file to manage permissions by default
